name: Release v0.9.14
body: Encode Sender as an address header to avoid improper encoding of email addresses.

name: Release v0.9.12
body: Add support for container `message/global` Content Types

name: Release 0.9.10
body:
* Disable generating parser.out #232 
* fix_leading_dot() cuts in the middle of a quoted character #234 
* Update README.rst to correct usage examples #227 
* Expose __version__ module-level attribute #217 
* Faster encodedword unfold by 15x #226

name: Release 0.9.9
body:
# Changed
- Replace the leading '.' in an quoted-printable encoded mime part to avoid obscure SMTP bug

name: Multi-Pattern utilization for AOL Verizon differential
work harder to avoid re-serializing headers
Add != operator
body:
Changes:

fix bug with != operator against a string (#78 @aroberts)

Thanks for the contribution!

name: Don't reserialize on header change, Reject consecutive dots in address
body:
Changes:
- Don't re-serialize the whole message when headers ahve been prepended but nothing else has changed ( @jeremyschlatter)
- Reject consecutive dots (.) in gmail addresses (#89 @jessespears)

name: Hotmail address fix, Add to known domains list, Typo fix
body:
Changes:
- Add yahoo.com.br to known domains list (#86 @lmcnearney)
- Allow hotmail addresses to begin with a number (#85 @lmcnearney)
- Typo fix (#81 @bulatb)

Thanks for the contributions!
